div.p: Dealing with people in a stressful situation so quite often you know, if it’s Christmas Eve and the boiler’s gone and they’ve got
all of the family coming over you have a very real situation on your hands and you have to try and find a solution, it’s problem solving so
finding a solution with very limited resources potentially to try and help them out of a sticky situation and dealing with their anger and their
emotions as well so kind of pacifying them but also finding them a solution.
I don’t know, sometimes it’s tough, you know, it’s a hard job, you know I’d never recommend this to somebody who wants a coasting job,
you know, it’s a job where you have to put your heart and soul into it and it’s hard work, it’s full-on the whole time but it’s very rewarding
